name: OverSeeker
description:
What is the game about? 

In this world, technology has advanced to the point that AI is capable of jobs that were once reserved for humans. Of course, all AI must be tested before assigning them to said jobs, but what better place is there to test it than at an airport security bay? 

Here, you will be playing as an AI named Kaiser, who has been assigned with profiling passengers before they go to their gate terminal. Each passenger has a report, that you must match with the passenger themselves, while keeping an eye out for a "BAD" label. 

Anyone that has been assigned with "BAD" must be sent to their deaths. 

There might be a chance that the AI could malfunction and lead to a couple of casualties, but the government is willing to take the risk for the sake of society. 

Controls

You only need a mouse to play this game.

Side Note 

This game was made in 3 days for the Wowie 4.0 Game Jam.
There were 4 people who made this game and this was a blast to make. Everyone did their job extremely well and quickly even though we didn't know each other before this. 

Hope you guys enjoy this game :D
